source.interface:
* This interface represents something generally accepted as a medium of * exchange, a measure of value, or a means of payment. The units for money * quantities is of type {@link Currency}. Jean-Marie Dautelle 3.0, February 13, 2006
* Holds the base unit for money quantities (symbol "Â¤", currency symbol).
